description: Detects execution of regsvr32 where the DLL is located in a highly suspicious locations
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: Regsvr32 Execution From Highly Suspicious Location
query: ((((process.executable.text:"*\\regsvr32.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"REGSVR32.EXE")) AND ((process.command_line.text:("*\:\\PerfLogs\\*" OR "*\:\\Temp\\*" OR "*\\Windows\\Registration\\CRMLog*" OR "*\\Windows\\System32\\com\\dmp\\*" OR "*\\Windows\\System32\\FxsTmp\\*" OR "*\\Windows\\System32\\Microsoft\\Crypto\\RSA\\MachineKeys\\*" OR "*\\Windows\\System32\\spool\\drivers\\color\\*" OR "*\\Windows\\System32\\spool\\PRINTERS\\*" OR "*\\Windows\\System32\\spool\\SERVERS\\*" OR "*\\Windows\\System32\\Tasks_Migrated\\*" OR "*\\Windows\\System32\\Tasks\\Microsoft\\Windows\\SyncCenter\\*" OR "*\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\com\\dmp\\*" OR "*\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\FxsTmp\\*" OR "*\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\Tasks\\Microsoft\\Windows\\PLA\\System\\*" OR "*\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\Tasks\\Microsoft\\Windows\\SyncCenter\\*" OR "*\\Windows\\Tasks\\*" OR "*\\Windows\\Tracing\\*")) OR ((process.command_line.text:("*\ \"C\:\\*" OR "*\ C\:\\*" OR "*\ 'C\:\\*" OR "*D\:\\*") AND (NOT process.command_line.text:("*C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\*" OR "*C\:\\Program\ Files\\*" OR "*C\:\\ProgramData\\*" OR "*C\:\\Users\\*" OR "*\ C\:\\Windows\\*" OR "*\ \"C\:\\Windows\\*" OR "*\ 'C\:\\Windows\\*")))))) AND (NOT ((process.command_line.text:"") OR (NOT _exists_:process.command_line.text))))
